  2. Videos

Videos

The Videos page is used to upload and manage videos and to create series and seasons. The body of the page will list all videos in the account.

Upload videos
  1. Click .
  2. Browse and select videos to upload.

> Show me how

> Details

View video details
  1. Click on a video name to open the Video Details page.
Search videos
  1. Enter search terms and press enter.

The following video fields will be searched:

  • Video ID
  • Name
  • Short description
  • Long description
  • Tags
  • Reference ID
  • Custom fields

> Details

View all series
  1. In the left navigation click the All Series link.

> Details

Create series
  1. In the left navigation, click the Create Series link.
  2. Enter a Name for the Series.
  3. Click .

> Details

Create folder
  1. In the left navigation, click .
  2. Enter a name for the folder.
  3. Press enter.
View video details panel
  1. Select a video and then click

Click the button again to close the panel.

Edit video details for multiple videos
  1. Select one or more videos and then click .
  2. Make the appropriate changes.
  3. Click .

> Show me how

> Details

Add a video to a folder
  1. Select one or more videos.
  2. Click More > Move to Folder.
  3. Select a folder.
  4. Click

> Show me how

Create playlist

Manual Playlists can be created to group of videos where you control the order of playback.

  1. Click in the left navigation.
  2. Select a Playlist type of Manual.
  3. Enter a Playlist Name.
  4. Click

> Show me how

> Details

Smart Playlists can be created to automatically group videos based upon tag(s).

  1. Click in the left navigation.
  2. Select a Playlist type of Smart.
  3. Enter a Playlist Name.
  4. In the Smart Playlist Settings, select a Tags option and then enter the tag(s).  
  5. Click

> Show me how

> Details

Add videos to a manual playlist
  1. Select one or more videos.
  2. Click More > Add to Playlist.
  3. Click on a playlist name.
  4. Click .
Export video metadata
  1. Click .
  2. Select the video data to export.
  3. Click .

> Details

Select columns to display
  1. Click .
  2. Select the columns to display.
  3. Click outside the column list to close it.
